name: Joe Photon
description:
Play as Joe the Photon! Escape the dastardly Physicists Experiment to freedom.

Get through the levels as fast as possible with the most luminosity to get the highest score.

Made in 48hrs for Global Game Jam 2017

CONTROLS

Left Stick / W and S keys : change direction

Right Trigger / D key : Accelerate

A button / P key : change to wave form

B button / O key : change to single particle form

note: Fixed "not able to control" bug on the title screen
